title: SCOTUS Takes Up Case After Appeals Court Rules Homeless People Have A RIGHT To Camp On Your Sidewalk
description:
SCOTUS has decided to take up a case that could decide whether or not the rest of the country would succumb to the same conditions as San Francisco.

California is home to the largest population of degenerates living in tents on public property. These are often referred to as “homeless encampments”. But the dumb thing about that is that the reason people live like that

title: Watch: Man “Chokes Out” Coyote And Throws It In Dumpster To Save His Chihuahua From Attack
description:
Not all heroes wear capes. Some wear red bathrobes while they “choke out” coyotes to save their Chihuahua from becoming the dinner of an opportunist feeder.

A man named Timothy Snipe let out Roxie, his Chihuahua, to go to the potty. Roxie is actually a lot tougher than she looks because if you watch the video, it is almost as if she instigated the attack.

“[Roxie] started barking, and I was like what is she barking at,” Snipe said, according to the outlet.

Security video shows man wrestle with coyote during dog attack

title: Watch: Of Course, RuPaul Uses His Emmy Speech To Defend Indoctrinating Kids With Frag Queens
description:
If you could think of the top 1,000 people who you would go to for parenting advice, I highly doubt RuPaul would make that list. But he seems to disagree as he used his Emmy Acceptance Speech to defend drag queen storytime.

I know what you are thinking because am thinking the same thing. I am also shocked that the Emmys are still on the air.

In other news, RuPaul is considered talented enough to win an Emmy. But I guess there is no better explanation for Hollywood than that.

— (@)

title: Chicago Bragged About Securing MILLIONS To Expand EV Infrastructure, Now The Cars Won’t Charge In Winter
description:
The most infuriating thing about relying on the weather to control the weather is that you cannot actually control the weather. And no matter how hard the government taxes us, they will never be able to control the direction of the wind or the subfreezing temperatures in Chicago.

Because of this thing called “winter,” there is a storm in the Midwest right now. Subsequently, charging stations in Chicago have turned into Electric Vehicle cemeteries due to the fact it is too cold to charge the cars.

— (@)

title: “Twilight” Star Claims It's Such A "Gay" Movie: It’s All About Oppression!
description:
I don’t recall there being any relationship in the movie “Twilight” that featured a gay or lesbian couple. The entire series was based around a straight relationship. It involved a male and a female. So when the star of that film now claims that it was “such a gay movie” I am finding that very hard to believe.

— (@)

title: Biden Celebrates Trump's Iowa Landslide By, Once Again, Labeling All Of Us As “Extreme MAGA Republicans”
description:
Trump won the Iowa Caucus last time in a landslide victory. Subsequently, Sleepy Joe lashed out at “extreme MAGA Republicans” and then asked for donations to campaign.

The funny thing is, we all know Joe did not post that. He doesn't even know that was posted. It is unclear if he even knows Trump won because he is probably still sleeping.

One ironic difference between Sleepy Joe and Trump is that Trump wrote his own social media posts. But I would not be surprised if Biden does not even know that Twitter is now called X. That is the status quo.

— (@)

title: "Make sure they hear you, they’re in the windows": Progressive pro-Hamas supporters cause chaos outside children's hospital
description:
There was yet another pro-Hamas rally on the streets of Manhattan, chanting for the elimination of Israel. It has been 101 days since Hamas's terrorist attack on Israel and 100 days since supporters of that attack have taken to the streets of progressive cities in America to celebrate it. On Monday, they chose a cancer hospital. For children.

As of this writing, it is unclear which progressive dark money group funded the pro-Hamas rally against Israel outside of a cancer hospital for children.

title: "We're gonna come together": Trump praises DeSantis, Haley in call for unity after dominant Iowa Caucus win
description:
Trump Won, and now you can BUY THE SHIRT saying so on CrowderShop.com!

The Iowa Caucus is over and, affectively, the 2024 GOP Primary. Donald Trump is the nominee. Whether he is running against Joe Biden or someone else is to be determined. The bottom line is Donald Trump is the GOP nominee for President and now has the opportunity to regain the office he lost in 2020.

In his victory speech after a divisive (yet lopsided) primary, Trump called for unity. And that included praising his opponents Ron DeSantis and Nikki Haley.
